content: चूडा {@--1@} The hair on the top of the head, a single lock on the crown of the head (left after the ceremony of tonsure); <ls>R. 18. 51</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 36</ls>; <ls n="U.">5. 3</ls>; <ls n="U.">4. 20.</ls> {@--2@} The ceremony of tonsure. {@--3@} The crest of a cock or peacock; <ls>Pt. 2. 73.</ls> {@--4@} Any crest, plume or diadem. {@--5@} The head. {@--6@} Top, summit. {@--7@} A room on the top of a house. {@--8@} A well. {@--9@} An ornament (like a bracelet worn on the wrist).
